text: 4|131|As‌mane ya ache o yamine ya ache saba allahara'i [1]; tomadera age yaderake kitaba deya hayeche taderake ebam tomaderake'o nirdesa diyechi ye, tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara [2]. Ara tomara kuphari karale'o as‌mane ya ache o yamine ya ache ta saba'i allahara ebam allaha abhabamukta, prasansabhajana.
